resources.string: You\'re all setup and ready to rock!\n\nBluetooth Serial for Tasker will now show up as a Plugin within Tasker when adding a new event profile
The array %serial_data1, %serial_data2, etc contains the data received from the Bluetooth device.\nThe variable %serial_addr contains the address of the Bluetooth device sending the data.
Message to send. Can be hex with spaces (example: 0B AD F00D)
Invalid Hex: only spaces and even number of 0-9A-Fa-f allowed
This device does not support bluetooth
